description:
Google has merged Local Pages with Google+ Local. Google Plus will ultimately be a “One Stop Shop” that will give you all that you need to communicate with your target audience or other businesses. An important point to remember is that if your business relies on Google as your major source of online traffic and revenue, then you need to develop your Google+ strategy as soon as possible.

Your success will come not because of the simple presence of your page; it will be because you will understand that practicing the strategies you learning this course will mean that you are adding value and helping your clients and/or customers find what they are looking for when they are ready to buy!

This course is delivered in video and PDF format and is 50.96 minutes in length.
title: Google Plus Training
